radiographic_examinations.findings: Fluid-filled and dilated appendix measuring up to 8 mm with associated mural hyperemia and mild adjacent fat stranding. No evidence of abscess formation. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No pleural or pericardial effusion. Borderline splenomegaly measuring up to 13.6 cm without evidence of focal lesions. Normal pancreas and liver. No evidence of hydronephrosis or renal lesions. Unremarkable urinary bladder and reproductive organs. No retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy.
